name: Drop-In Services - Lockers and Restrooms
description: MNRC offers homeless residents in the Mission neighborhood with the following drop-in services: - Restrooms - Storage lockers - Safe space with security and chairs - Phones and chargers - Peer counseling - Shelter reservations
fullDescription: MNRC offers homeless residents in the Mission neighborhood with the following drop-in services: - Restrooms - Storage lockers - Safe space with security and chairs - Phones and chargers - Peer counseling - Shelter reservations
